keyMoments.title: Sees His Father's Ship
keyMoments.description: Rapanui spots what appears to be his father on a Marine ship within the Rainbow Mist, revealing his father's tragic fate.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that Rapanui's father was also trapped in the Rainbow Mist while searching for it.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Henzo
keyMoments.description: Rapanui confronts Henzo about Wetton's burning of their village, initially refusing to believe this is his childhood friend.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Rapanui struggling to reconcile the time displacement with his memories.

keyMoments.title: Accepts 50 Years Have Passed
keyMoments.description: Unable to punch Henzo, Rapanui breaks down crying as he accepts that 50 years have truly passed.
keyMoments.significance: The emotional climax of Rapanui's character arc in this episode.

relationships.description: Childhood friend separated by 50 years due to Rainbow Mist time displacement.

evolutionMoments.description: Rapanui confronts Henzo, struggling to accept the time gap, but eventually reconciles.

relationships.description: Luffy accompanies Rapanui through the Rainbow Mist.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy and Rapanui journey together through the mist.

reveals.information: His father was a Marine who became trapped in the Rainbow Mist while searching for it
Rapanui accepts that 50 years have passed while he remained unchanged

keyMoments.title: Activates Rainbow Tower
keyMoments.description: Wetton activates the Rainbow Tower to create a bridge into the Rainbow Mist, revealing his true scheme.
keyMoments.significance: The culmination of Wetton's plan to access and plunder Ape's Concert.

keyMoments.title: Invades Ape's Concert
keyMoments.description: Wetton orders his forces to invade Ape's Concert through the Rainbow Tower and seize all treasures.
keyMoments.significance: Begins the final conflict of the arc.

keyMoments.title: Uses Silver Barbecue
keyMoments.description: Wetton demonstrates his Silver Barbecue technique using his Flame Suit.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Wetton's combat abilities through technology.

abilities.description: Shoots flames at incapacitated targets using his Flame Suit mecha.

reveals.information: Uses Rainbow Tower to access and plunder Ape's Concert

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Dragon Spark
keyMoments.description: Lake uses his Dragon Spark technique to severely electrocute opponents.

keyMoments.title: Electrocutes Sanji
keyMoments.description: Lake electrocutes Sanji to protect Wetton from attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Lake's loyalty and effectiveness in combat.

abilities.description: Catches opponents with both rods and severely electrocutes them with electrical current traversing between the rods.
Launches electrical bolts from rod-like appendages causing large electrical explosions.

relationships.description: Lake is Wetton's grandson and loyally protects him.

keyMoments.title: Observes Rainbow Tower
keyMoments.description: Henzo sees the Rainbow Tower extending into Ape's Concert, his decades of research coming to fruition.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the result of Henzo's 50 years of dedication.

keyMoments.title: Confronted by Rapanui
keyMoments.description: Henzo is confronted by Rapanui about working for Wetton, defended by Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the depth of Henzo's sacrifice and endurance over 50 years.

relationships.description: Childhood friend who Henzo spent 50 years trying to save.

evolutionMoments.description: Henzo is confronted by Rapanui but their friendship is reaffirmed.

reveals.information: Worked for Wetton for 50 years to fund research into saving his childhood friends from the Rainbow Mist

keyMoments.title: Tricks Akibi
keyMoments.description: Ian successfully tricks Akibi into releasing him from his cell.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Wetton's Third Generation
keyMoments.description: Ian learns that Wetton has progressed to his third generation.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the generational span of Wetton's influence.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Ship Graveyard Treasure
keyMoments.description: Nami finds treasure in the ship graveyard but realizes it's useless if they can't escape.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's practical thinking despite her love of treasure.

keyMoments.title: Challenged as Navigator
keyMoments.description: Usopp challenges Nami to use her navigator skills to escape the Rainbow Mist.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights Nami's role as navigator even in supernatural situations.

keyMoments.title: Journeys with Rapanui
keyMoments.description: Luffy accompanies Rapanui through the Rainbow Mist.

keyMoments.title: Returns to Face Wetton
keyMoments.description: Luffy returns with Rapanui to confront Wetton's invasion.
